explains: n. 附件，配件；装饰品，配饰；同谋，从犯
adj. 辅助的，副的；附属的；同谋的

sentences.en: He was charged with being an accessory to murder.
sentences.cn: 他被控为谋杀罪的从犯。

sentences.en: The company serves the national automotive aftermarket with a broad range of accessory and recreational-vehicle products.
sentences.cn: 该公司为全国机动车售后市场提供各种配件和休闲车产品。

sentences.en: For this reason, the watch industry has become an accessory business in recent years.
sentences.cn: 正因如此，手表行业近年来已成为配件行业。
